title: Which fields of science equip you best for becoming an entrepreneur? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you love science and entrepreneurship, I highly recommend focusing on the field of science that you find most interesting. Don’t pick a science “because it equips you best”. There is no such thing. Accountancy is great for book-keeping, law - for drafting agreements, finance - for keeping your cashflow healthy. If you study the field that you find truly fascinating, you will see what problems it faces. You will notice that certain tasks take forever to complete and that could be optimised. And that is where your entrepreneurial character will come in handy! After all all businesses solve some problem that the client faces. Do you think someone grows up thinking they will be supplying motherboards? Or deep cleaning car seats? Or perhaps you have always wanted to open a vegan restaurant in Antarctica? Of course not. And that’s the key - you find opportunities on your way, as you explore a field - or multiple fields - in-depth. Become an expert in whatever you love, and you will see business opportunities where others will fail to see it. —— Hope this helps! If you liked the above response, you can read up on more case studies for entrepreneurs and advice that I give here: Home - Rykov Media

What is necessary is whatever it takes to understand your product. It can be chemistry, mechanical, biology, medicine, or whatever. Then you need some business schooling to understand what it takes to sell your product and organize a new company.
